title: Young's syndrome (a case report).
summary: A case of Young's syndrome is described presenting with obstructive azoospermia, sinusitis, otitis media and bronchitis. ...
abstract: A case of Young's syndrome is described presenting with obstructive azoospermia, sinusitis, otitis media and bronchitis. It is essential to examine ciliary function and ultrastructure in order to make this diagnosis.
